node.title: Friday Download: Five Knives – Savages
node.content:
The Red Bull Records act drops their brand new single and a remix content via BitTorrent Bundle.

In this edition of Friday Download: Five Knives bring a potent balance of dance, punk and pop to BitTorrent Bundle. 2014 was a monumental year for the Nashville four-piece. As their tracks dominated DJ playlists and dancefloors around the world, the band inked a deal with Red Bull Records, hit the road with Icona Pop, and received the news that Eddie Amador’s remix of their track “The Rising” would be up for a GRAMMY in 2015.



Five Knives are back with their new single Savages available today exclusively via BitTorrent Bundle. In addition, the group and their label, Red Bull Records, have teamed with EDM.com to launch the Savages Remix Competition. Download the Bundle to grab the stems for the new single, and upload your remix of the track to the competition channel on Soundcloud.

Five Knives BitTorrent Bundle

01 – Five Knives – Savages.mp3
02 – Five Knives – Savages​ Stems
03 – The Rising (Eddie Amador Remix) [Music]
04 – Savages (Pretty Lights Remix) [Music]
05 – Sugar (Jauz Remix) [Music]
06 – Sugar (UZ Remix) [Music]
07 – Five Knives Tour Diary [Video]

About BitTorrent Bundle

BitTorrent Bundle is a publishing project made with and for the world’s creative community. Our mission is to help artists connect directly with fans, inside the content they share. Each BitTorrent Bundle allows artists to distribute content directly to the Internet. And each Bundle comes with a key.

Fans can unlock artist content with an email address, or a direct payment to the artist. The idea is to make each song a storefront, and each file more valuable, every time it’s shared. Got ideas for the next BitTorrent Bundle? Hit us up.
